message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, we're confident it will be a valuable asset for you. We're offering this exceptional item at a special introductory price of $12000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $9000?

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we understand your budget constraints, we'd like to present an alternative that might better suit your needs. Considering the value and benefits of our product, we're proposing a revised price of $10500. This still offers significant savings compared to our original price, while ensuring you receive a product that meets your requirements.
Thank you for adjusting the price, Alice. I appreciate your effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $9500. I hope this aligns more closely with your product's value to me.

We appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. To further accommodate your budget, we're pleased to offer the product at a price of $10000. This remains a competitive offer considering the high-quality features and benefits of our product. We believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our needs and your budget.

Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I would like to propose a final offer of $9500. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle of our discussions and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Considering the value and benefits of our product, we're happy to extend our offer to $9800. This price still represents a significant discount compared to our initial asking price, while ensuring you receive a product that exceeds your expectations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget constraints. I would like to counter with an offer of $9600. I hope this proposal will be acceptable and allow us to conclude our negotiations.

We're glad to hear that our previous offers have been helpful, Bob. In light of your latest proposal, we're willing to consider a price of $9700 for our product. This remains a competitive offer that balances our needs with your budgetary considerations.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to conclude our discussions by proposing a final offer of $9650. I hope this will be a satisfactory conclusion to our negotiations.
